w.feedback: No article should be used here.

a.feedback: Correct! An indefinite article is needed here.

an.feedback: Correct! An indefinite article is needed here.

An.feedback: Correct! An indefinite article is needed here.

the.feedback: Correct! A definite article is needed here because the noun is unique.

The.feedback: Correct! A definite article is needed here because the noun is unique.
